title: Area II: Barbara searches the squares
brief_description: A girl explores an imaginary place called Arealand where she learns about the use of squares in metric measurment. Demonstrates how to determine area either by counting squares of by multiplying columns by rows. No other credits availabe. Suitable for Mid-Upper Primary students.
